name: Rockman
description:
This game is freeware and and it was written for the Syntax Bomb coding competition 6: https://www.syntaxbomb.com

I give full permission to distribute anywhere and everywhere but I retain the copyright and reverse engineering the game is not acceptable.

Both PC and Mac versions are available

Controls:-

Cursor keys to move around the caves and Space bar with direction to kick a rock.

Objective:-

Full instructions are in the game menu.

Remake of a classic Vic 20 game from Mastertronic, 1984.
